All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CameraManager
The camera manager for the game.
Cctv
The Cctv class represents a stationary surveillance camera (CCTV) in the game.
Character
Represents a character in the game.
CharacterTextureManager
The manager responsible for handling character textures and animations.
CollisionMapManager
Collision manager for objects defined in map layers.
DetectionManager
The detection manager that tracks the player's detection status.
Dog
The Dog class represents an enemy dog in the game.
Enemy
Abstract class representing an enemy in the game.
EnemyManager
The enemy manager that handles the management of enemies in the game.
EnemyTest
Unit test class for testing the behavior of the Enemy class.
GameConfigManager
The Game Configuration Manager.
GameOverScreen
Screen implementation that represents the Game Over screen.
GameScreen
The GameScreen class represents the main game screen where the player can interact with the game world, control the character, collect weapons, and fight enemies.
Grenade
Represents a grenade in the game.
Guard
The Guard class represents an enemy guard in the game.
Gun
Represents a gun-type weapon (such as a pistol, rifle, etc.) in the game.
Inventory
Represents an inventory containing a list of weapons.
Lwjgl3Launcher
Launches the desktop (LWJGL3) application for the game.
MenuScreen
MenuScreen represents the main menu screen of the game.
MyGdxGame
The main game class for the game application.
NextLevelScreen
The NextLevelScreen class represents the screen shown when the player progresses to the next level.
Playable
Interface for the player and enemy entities.
Player
Represents the player in the game.
PlayerTest
Unit test class for testing the behavior of the Player class.
Score
Represents a score associated with a player.
ScoreManager
The game score manager.
StartupHelper
Adds some utilities to ensure that the JVM was started with the -XstartOnFirstThread argument, which is required on macOS for LWJGL 3 to function.
Weapon
Abstract class representing a weapon in the game.
WeaponManager
The weapon manager for the game.
